column4: so maildirs, if anything, should be the easier to backup and recover.
yes and no.  I have regular backups of 2.5 million emails stored as maildir.  It goes well but the differential backups (incrementals) sometimes take a bit
yes, a lot of data. But would it be any easier if they were all in mbox?
yes and know.  easier to back up, but I've had mboxes implode on me.  maildir is actually not too bad, provided you don't have users storing 8 years of unsorted email
